metadata.unit_designation: Xxii Corpo D Armata Xxii Corps
metadata.commander_name: Generale di Corpo d'Armata Petassi Manella

narrative.title: Xxii Corpo D Armata Xxii Corps - 1940Q4
narrative.situation: Italian Army Corps deployed in North Africa during 1940Q4.
narrative.objectives: General reserve corps and Tobruk fortress defense. Best-supplied corps in 10th Army. NOT committed to forward operations at Sidi Barrani. Garrison and defensive role throughout Q4 1940.
narrative.axis_objective: Maintain defensive positions and inflict maximum casualties on Allied forces.
narrative.allied_objective: Advance and secure strategic objectives while minimizing casualties.

weather.terrain: Coastal plain at Tobruk - fortress/port location

air_support.note: No theater air summary available for this quarter

special_rules: Tobruk port access - direct sea supply route
General reserve for 10th Army - could support any sector
Mixed infantry and militia divisions plus fortress troops

environment.terrain_type: Coastal plain at Tobruk - fortress/port location
